Lyric:
[00:00.550]So am I still waiting
[00:03.110]For this world to stop hating
[00:05.630]Can't find a good reason
[00:08.900]Can't find hope to believe in 
[00:21.800]Drop dead a bullet to my head
[00:24.320]Your words are like a gun in hand
[00:26.760]You can't change the state of the nation
[00:29.180]We just need some motivation
[00:31.730]These eyes have seen no conviction
[00:34.150]Just lies and more contradiction 
[00:36.740]So tell me what would you say
[00:39.180]I'd say its up: to me 
[00:42.730]So am I still waiting

[00:50.550]Can't find hope to believe in 
[00:58.800]Ignorance and Understanding
[01:00.530]We're the first ones to jump in line

[01:05.500]But whos left? To start the pleading

[01:46.930]If this is worthless
